summary: Only use reads from the specified read group

arguments.summary: The name of the read group to keep, filtering out all others
arguments.name: --read_group_to_keep

description:
This filter is useful for isolating data from one particular read group (usually a single lane).

Usage example

Use only reads from the read group with ID "read_group_1

     java -jar GenomeAnalysisTk.jar \
         -T ToolName \
         -R reference.fasta \
         -I input.bam \
         -o output.file \
         -rf SingleReadGroup \
         -goodRG read_group_1
name: SingleReadGroupFilter
